sentences.sContent: Will discuss concepts such as phoneme, morpheme , affix, rules and constraints.
sentences.sContent_eng: Will discuss concepts such as phoneme, morpheme , affix, rules and constraints.
sentences.sCn: 将被提及的概念包括音位、 语素、 词缀、 规则和限制。

sentences.sContent: After surveying all the structures with "de", we hold that there are three different "de" in modern Chinese, they are auxiliary verb, auxiliary word and affix.
sentences.sContent_eng: After surveying all the structures with "de", we hold that there are three different "de" in modern Chinese, they are auxiliary verb, auxiliary word and affix.
sentences.sCn: 最后，综观现代汉语中与“得”有关的各种结构，本文认为现代汉语中有助动词、助词、词缀三个不同性质的轻声“得”。

synos.tran: 粘上；署名；将罪责加之于

remMethod.val: af + fix(固定) → 固定上去 → 黏上， 贴上

trans.tranCn: 黏上， 贴上； 添上
trans.tranOther: to fasten or stick something to something else
a group of letters added to the beginning or end of a word to change its meaning or use, such as ‘un-’, ‘mis-’, ‘-ness’, or ‘-ly’
